start_boss.text: We'll need a lot of firepower for this one.

retreat.text: We run, so we can spread word of Ludd another day.
Forgive me for running, My Lord.

engaged.text: Watch out, we might get shot.
Open fire, aim at structural vulnerability.
How many more do we have to kill?

pursuing.text: Leave none of the blasphemers alive!

running.text: It's not worth losing our lives, disengage.
Reverse course! May Ludd help us.

hull_90.text: Minimum damage sustained, fix the damage now.
Prepare damage control, we might lose more people.

hull_50.text: Launch ALL missiles if we have any!

hull_30.text: Well, it's good that I don't use these consoles to aim, I'd be screwed otherwise.
What the hell helmsman, get us the hell out of here.

overload.text: I hope we won't end up on the wrong end of a missile barrage now.
Flux grid is temporarily overloaded, send help.

death.text: Looks like we're going to Heaven today.

victory.text: Let us pray for the dead.
Prayer after the battle at chapel onboard, presence mandatory.

victory_boss.text: Ludd has guided us through this.
May we never face such a beast again...
